backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and story creation with access control and in‑memory storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI text updates to affected frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries for all frontend components, pages, hooks, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root element and document title "yor txt".
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with routes for Home, Login, and Stories wrapped in AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component providing header, footer, and routed page content structure.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Displays current user name and sign‑out button using Internet Identity and React Query.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing current year, "yor txt" copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with "yor txt" branding, navigation buttons, and auth status.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/StoryList.tsx: Renders stories with author info, timestamps, and formatted content.
frontend/src/components/StorySubmissionF: Form for submitting new stories with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and save the caller’s user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, managing login, stored identities, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty module exporting nothing, placeholder for feature-specific hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Provides hooks to fetch all stories and submit new ones through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfiles.ts: Fetches multiple user profiles by principal, deduplicating and aggregating results.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and basic styling utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with marketing content and navigation to stories or login.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and shows profile setup when required.
frontend/src/pages/StoriesPage.tsx: Displays story list, story submission for authenticated users, and prompts login when needed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash-based), storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and persisting or clearing them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including implemented features, pending feature requests, and metadata for the 'yor txt' app.
